item.title: 2024-CW06 notes
item.description: StringZilla: Up to 10x faster strings for C, C++, Python, Rust, and Swift, leveraging SWAR and SIMD on Arm Neon and x86 AVX2 & AVX-512-capable chips to accelerate search, sort, edit distances, alignment scores, etc ðŸ¦– Why do we need monads?: Nice explanation. ARM64 assembly: I should learn at least the basics of assembly… ARMv8 AArch64/ARM64 Full Beginner’s Assembly Tutorial HelloSilicon: An introduction to assembly on Apple Silicon Macs. Writing ARM64 code for Apple platforms
